title: The Return
description: The thrilling conclusion to The Sun and the RavenIt started with an unquenchable thirst for adventure.It ends with The Return.To escape the clutches of the sinister Foscora, Aydiin plunged into the Underworld. While he attempts to free himself from his new confines, Byanca becomes little more than a puppet of the Night Goddess. As she suffers at the whims of an immortal tormenter, Barrick teams up with Hermnes and Mirna to rescue her. Across the world, Seb and Joon scheme to overthrow an empire and steal a Great Stone.The Forgotten Sun has risen. Night has come to the world. The Return is nigh.
author: Jon Monson
